thread.title: Satisfied Clients Have Selected Stephanie Herbert, RE/MAX Professionals, for a Prestigious
thread.title_full: Satisfied Clients Have Selected Stephanie Herbert, RE/MAX Professionals, for a Prestigious Award

author: Five Star Professional Representative
title: Satisfied Clients Have Selected Stephanie Herbert, RE/MAX Professionals, for a Prestigious
text:
“This award is an honor,” Stephanie says. “I work very hard to take care of my clients, and without them and their reviews, this would not be made possible.” And to her clients: “I just want to say thank you for the recognition.”
For Stephanie, her profession was something she was surrounded by her whole life.
“I grew up with real estate — I come from a family of hardworking builders and skilled trade workers,” she says.
Here is a little more about Stephanie: “As premier real estate agents in Bolingbrook, we are here to provide you with all the resources and information you need to buy or sell real estate. We work with buyers and sellers in Bolingbrook, Romeoville, Plainfield, Woodridge, Downers Grove, and the surrounding areas, and we have had extensive training in the latest real estate marketing strategies. We are confident that we can offer you knowledge and tools most other agents can’t.” — Stephanie Herbert
